description: This table extracts the related multiple response Blood Special Requirements - Degree - Aduit Trail (I EPT 18024) item, which stores the audit trail of degrees of criticality of blood special requirements for the patient. It contains the current values as well as all previous values for this patient.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated instance of editing blood special requirements in the patient's record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of multiple edited pieces of information associated with the patient and the editing instance.

columns.name: BLOOD_REQTS_DEGREE_CHANGES_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores all previously recorded values for the degree of criticality of each of the patient's blood special requirements.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
